Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "+opage stands for Offline Page, and is an extension to the paging system. It is used to send and manipulate pages to/from people who are currently not online.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage places a date stamp in the beginning of all pages, in the format \\"[Mon DD HH:MM]\\".\\r\\n+opage allows you to send multiple pages to the same person or account. Each page is paragraph separated."

"+opage kalle \\"You're never online these days, Kalle!\\"\\r\\n Send an offline page to the character Kalle.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage acct zwoc \\"You're never online these days, Kalle!\\"\\r\\n Send an offline page to the account Zwoc.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage accept\\r\\n Accept all pending pages to you.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage see\\r\\n See all pending pages to you.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage reset kalle\\r\\n Remove all pending pages from you to Kalle.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage acct reset zwoc\\r\\n Remove all pending pages from you to the account Zwoc.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage recall kalle\\r\\n Display all pending pages from you to Kalle.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage kalle lucy george \\"Gimme a poke when ya see this, guys...\\"\\r\\n Send an offline page to several people simultaneously.\\r\\n\\r\\n+opage acct someone someonelse \\"Two account pages.\\"\\r\\n Send multiple pages to accounts."
"Note: The syntax for resetting an account page changed from [ +opage reset acct \ ] to [ +opage acct reset \ ]."
